subject: Re: [R] percentage in R
body:
Hi,

do you want to display the proportion as a character string? This  
would be simple:

 > a <- 0.25
 > aa <- paste(a*100, "%", sep="")
 > aa
[1] "25%"

Cheers,
Christoph


On 21.06.2007, at 22:45, genomenet@gmail.com wrote:

> Hi There,
